SELECT jc_payment_app.*, IFNULL(jc_payment_app.oa_fapiao,'') AS oaFapiao, IFNULL(jc_payment_app.oa_fapiao_type,'') AS oaFapiaoType, (SELECT brand FROM wm_customer where id=jc_oa_schedule.customer) customer, wm_office_account.NAME AS medium_name, jc_oa_schedule.put_date, jc_oa_schedule.put_position, ( SELECT NAME FROM bms_manager WHERE id = jc_oa_schedule.creator ) AS create_username, ( SELECT NAME FROM bms_manager WHERE id = jc_payment_app.creator ) AS mediumname FROM jc_payment_app, jc_oa_schedule, wm_office_account
jc_payment_app.`schedule` = jc_oa_schedule.id AND jc_oa_schedule.office_account = wm_office_account.id
AND jc_payment_app.creator =#{condition.creator}
AND jc_payment_app.fapiao is NULL AND jc_payment_app.oa_fapiao <> -1 AND jc_oa_schedule.state not in ('3','9')
AND jc_payment_app.pay_account LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.pay_account},'%')
AND wm_office_account.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.s_medium},'%')
AND jc_payment_app.account_holder like CONCAT('%',#{condition.s_rec_name},'%')
AND jc_payment_app.state IN
#{state}
ORDER BY jc_payment_app.id DESC
